title: Appellant enforcement common submission properties
description: Schema defining any common properties for enforcement appeals

submissionId.description: Case submission id - link to draft submission created by appellant

descriptionOfAllegedBreach.description: A description of the alleged breach

caseProcedure.description: The type of procedure for the appeal

lpaCode.description: A unique identifier for the Local Planning Authority
lpaCode.$comment: Uses the internal PINS code identifying LPAs

caseSubmittedDate.description: The date the appeal was submitted by the appellant

enforcementNotice.description: Indicates if an enforcement notice is the reason for the appeal

enforcementReference.description: The unique identifier of the enforcement notice

enforcementIssueDate.description: The date the enforcement notice was issued

enforcementEffectiveDate.description: The date the enforcement notice took effect

contactPlanningInspectorateDate.description: The date the enforcement notice took effect

interestInLand.description: The individual's interest in the appeal land

caseSubmissionDueDate.description: The statutory deadline for submitting an appeal from the original LPA decision date

examples: The site is accessible through the small gate on the left of the property
There is an aggressive dog in the property

siteSafetyDetails.description: Provided information on site health and safety

appellantCostsAppliedFor.description: Indicates if the appellant has applied for costs

appellantProcedurePreference.description: The procedure preference indicated by the appellant

appellantProcedurePreferenceDetails.description: The procedure details preference indicated by the appellant

appellantProcedurePreferenceDuration.description: The duration of the procedure indicated by the appellant

appellantProcedurePreferenceWitnessCount.description: The number of witnesses appellant has suggested for inquiries preference

statusPlanningObligation.description: The planning obligation information, if available

nearbyCaseReferences.description: A list of related case references known to the appellant and the LPA
